title: Hand-Stitched Shweshwe Evening Dress
description: A beautifully crafted evening dress made from authentic Shweshwe fabric, hand-stitched by local artisans in Johannesburg. This piece combines traditional African patterns with contemporary design, perfect for special occasions.

artisanNotes.hook: Inspired by the vibrant streets of Joburg, this piece bridges the gap between traditional African heritage and modern fashion elegance.
artisanNotes.story: This dress was created by master artisan Thandiwe M., who has been working with Shweshwe fabric for over 20 years. Each piece takes approximately 15 hours to complete, with careful attention to detail and traditional stitching techniques passed down through generations.

careGuidelines:
Hand wash only with cold water
Avoid direct sunlight during drying
Iron on low heat with cloth barrier
Dry clean recommended for best results
packagingNarrative: Packed in eco-friendly locally manufactured materials. Each dress comes in a reusable fabric bag made from recycled materials, along with a care card printed on sustainable paper.
